trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: Handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其状态以及它包含的值的行的错误。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，行标题中显示错误标志符号除非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ShowRowErrors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>检索属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的行，然后使用此信息来更改或修改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowErrorTextNeededEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用行的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> value for multiple rows.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A>为多行值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error text for the row.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置行的错误文本。

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a row.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初包含值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性如果设置为的行。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorText property value displays as a ToolTip for the error glyph in the row header.
trans-unit.target: ErrorText 属性值显示为工具提示的行标题中的错误标志符号。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the error text for the row.
trans-unit.target: 表示行的错误文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowErrorTextNeeded"></xref> event.
The zero based row index for the row.
